					rand = random
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					rand = 100
				}
				round_variable = rand
				clamp_variable = {
					var = rand
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}

					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio

						}

					}

					max = 100
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio

					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand

				}

						}

				}

				multiply_variable = {
					rand = 100
				}
				round_variable = rand
				clamp_variable = {
					var = rand
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = paperclip_tech_bonus
						bonus = 2
						uses = 1
						technology = tech_diamond_dog_misc3
					}
				}
			}

					var = rand
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}

						name = paperclip_tech_bonus

						uses = 1

				}

						name = paperclip_tech_bonus
						bonus = 2
						uses = 1
						technology = tech_griffon_navy3
					}
				}

					NOT = {
						has_tech = tech_griffon_navy4
					}
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_griffon_navy4
					}

				set_variable = {
					rand = random
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					rand = 100
				}
				round_variable = rand
				clamp_variable = {
					var = rand
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}

					max = 100

				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}

						name = paperclip_tech_bonus
						bonus = 2
						uses = 1
						technology = tech_deer_misc_b
					}
				}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_changeling_race_tech = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {

			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_tech = tech_jager_a
					}
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_jager_a
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					rand = random
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					rand = 100
				}
				round_variable = rand
				clamp_variable = {
					var = rand
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = paperclip_tech_bonus
						bonus = 2
						uses = 1
						technology = tech_jager_a
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {

							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = paperclip_tech_bonus
						bonus = 2
						uses = 1
						technology = tech_infiltrators_si_lar
					}
				}
			}

							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio

				}

					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				add_tech_bonus = {
					name = paperclip_tech_bonus
					bonus = 2
					uses = 1
					technology = tech_military_police
				}
			}

						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}

					name = paperclip_tech_bonus
					bonus = 2
					uses = 1
					technology = tech_engineers_b
				}
			}

						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				add_tech_bonus = {
					name = paperclip_tech_bonus
					bonus = 2
					uses = 1
					technology = sp_helicopter_transport_pods_tech
				}
			}
		}

							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = paperclip_tech_bonus
						bonus = 2
						uses = 1
						technology = early_carrier
					}
				}
			}

		}

			}

				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100

				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				add_tech_bonus = {
					name = paperclip_tech_bonus
					bonus = 2
					uses = 1
					technology = urban_specialization
				}
			}

				rand = 100
			}

				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}

					check_variable = {
						var = rand

				}
				PREV = {
					has_tech = support_weapons_c
				}
			}

				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				add_tech_bonus = {
					name = paperclip_tech_bonus
					bonus = 2
					uses = 1
					technology = support_weapons_c
				}
			}

				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				add_tech_bonus = {
					name = paperclip_tech_bonus
					bonus = 2
					uses = 1
					technology = advanced_rubber_processing
				}
			}

					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				add_tech_bonus = {
					name = paperclip_tech_bonus
					bonus = 2
					uses = 1
					technology = construction5
				}
			}
		}

			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}

				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand

						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				add_tech_bonus = {
					name = paperclip_tech_bonus
					bonus = 2
					uses = 1
					technology = advanced_decryption_lar
				}
			}
		}

						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}

			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				add_tech_bonus = {
					name = paperclip_tech_bonus
					bonus = 2
					uses = 1
					technology = antiair_b
				}
			}
		}

					rand = 100
				}
				round_variable = rand
				clamp_variable = {
					var = rand
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}

					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}

						name = paperclip_tech_bonus
						bonus = 2
						uses = 1
						technology = basic_medium_art

					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = paperclip_tech_bonus
						bonus = 2
						uses = 1
						technology = super_heavy_td
					}
				}

						has_tech = main_battle_tank_a
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					rand = random
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					rand = 100
				}
				round_variable = rand
				clamp_variable = {
					var = rand
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = paperclip_tech_bonus
						bonus = 2
						uses = 1
						technology = main_battle_tank_a
					}
				}

					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					rand = random
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					rand = 100
				}
				round_variable = rand
				clamp_variable = {
					var = rand
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = paperclip_tech_bonus
						bonus = 2
						uses = 1
						technology = advanced_small_airframe
					}
				}

				multiply_variable = {
					rand = 100
				}
				round_variable = rand
				clamp_variable = {
					var = rand
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = paperclip_tech_bonus
						bonus = 2
						uses = 1
						technology = hardpoints
					}
				}
			}

							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}

						name = paperclip_tech_bonus

						uses = 1
						technology = fighter1
					}
				}

				}
				set_variable = {
					rand = random
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					rand = 100
				}
				round_variable = rand
				clamp_variable = {
					var = rand
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = paperclip_tech_bonus
						bonus = 2
						uses = 1
						technology = tactical_bomber1
					}
				}
			}

		## kirin_tech
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_kirin_race_tech = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_tech = tech_kirin_vanguard
					}
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_kirin_vanguard
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					rand = random
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					rand = 100
				}
				round_variable = rand
				clamp_variable = {
					var = rand
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}

					max = 100

							var = rand

							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}

					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_hippogriff_engineering
					}
				}

					rand = random
				}

					rand = 100

					var = rand
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}

						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio

					rand = 100
				}
				round_variable = rand
				clamp_variable = {
					var = rand
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = rand
							value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = paperclip_tech_bonus
						bonus = 2
						uses = 1
						technology = tech_hippogriff_endurance5
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_tech = tech_hippogriff_endurance6

		### special projects
		
		## air_projects
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_air_bouncing_bomb
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_air_bouncing_bomb
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}

				min = 0
				max = 100
			}

					check_variable = {
						var = rand

						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.medium.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.medium.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_air_bouncing_bomb = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_air
				}
			}
		}

				}

					value = 0.1

				}
			}

				}

				rand = random
			}

				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand

				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}

				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio

			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_land_composite_armor
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_land_composite_armor
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.small.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.small.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_land_composite_armor = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_land
				}

			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.small.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.small.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_air_radar_3 = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_air
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_air_radar_4
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_air_radar_4
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.medium.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.medium.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_air_radar_4 = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_air
				}
			}
		}

		## rocket_projects
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_flying_bomb
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_flying_bomb
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.medium.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.medium.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_rockets_flying_bomb = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_air
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_air_to_air_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_air_to_air_missile
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.insane.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.insane.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_rockets_air_to_air_missile = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_air
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_anti_radiation_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_anti_radiation_missile
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_rockets_anti_radiation_missile = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_air
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_air_launched_cruise_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_air_launched_cruise_missile
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_rockets_air_launched_cruise_missile = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_air
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_ballistic_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_ballistic_missile
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_rockets_ballistic_missile = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_air
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_medium_range_ballistic_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_medium_range_ballistic_missile
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_rockets_medium_range_ballistic_missile = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_air
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_long_range_ballistic_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_long_range_ballistic_missile
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_rockets_long_range_ballistic_missile = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_air
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_ground_to_air_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_ground_to_air_missile
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_rockets_ground_to_air_missile = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_air
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_anti_ballistic_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_anti_ballistic_missile
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_rockets_anti_ballistic_missile = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_air
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rocket_interceptor
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rocket_interceptor
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				rand = random
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				rand = 100
			}
			round_variable = rand
			clamp_variable = {
				var = rand
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = rand
						value = PREV.PREV.previous_owner_industry_ratio
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.min
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = constant:sp_complexity.large.max
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					oppaperclip_sp_bonus = 0.01
				}
				sp:sp_rocket_interceptor = {
					add_project_progress_ratio = oppaperclip_sp_bonus
				}
				add_breakthrough_progress = {
					value = 0.1
					specialization = specialization_air
				}
			}
		}

		clear_variable = rand
	}
}
